comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Henryk Sinekiewicz (1846-1916; ck spelling), Polish journalist. Here's his wikipedia entry: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Henryk_Sienkiewicz

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: Author of (among other works) the novel, "Quo Vadis?" which was made into a 1950s Hollywood blockbuster. In 1905, he had won the Nobel Prize for literature, which is granted not for a specific work, but for the entire body of an author's literary achievement.

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content:
pennylrichardsca and Wystan,

Thanks for the additional information on Henryk Sienkiewicz. We will get his name corrected and add more detail to the record when we update.
